articles.title: Colts to start Philip Rivers vs. Seahawks just days after QB came out of retirement - NFL.com
articles.description: More than four years after playing his last snap, Philip Rivers will be elevated from the Indianapolis Colts practice squad to the team's active roster in hopes of remedying the team’s QB ills.

articles.author: Thomas Beaumont, Isabella Volmert, The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump couldn't insult his way to victory in Indiana redistricting battle. 'Folks in our state don’t react well to being bullied' - Fortune
articles.description: The president brushed off the defeat, saying he “wasn’t working on it very hard." But the White House had spent months engaged in what Republican Sen. Andy Zay described as “a full-court press.”
articles.content: If Indiana Republican senators had any doubt about what to do with President Donald Trumps redistricting proposal, he helped them make up their minds the night before this weeks vote.In a social medi… [+5208 chars]
